Define a label segment for JamPolygon

Source: R/venndir-label-outside-jp.R
label_segment_JamPolygon.Rd

Define a label segment for JamPolygon

Usage

label_segment_JamPolygon(
  x0,
  x1,
  y0,
  y1,
  jp,
  return_class = c("point", "matrix"),
  buffer = 0,
  plot_debug = FALSE,
  relative = TRUE,
  verbose = FALSE,
  ...
)
